title: (NA) Gold 3 Top Main Looking For Serious Team!!!

embed.description: Mr Otter / Gold 3 40LP / 348W 359L Win Ratio 49% / Jhin - 24W 19L Win Ratio 56%, Ashe - 23W 14L Win Ratio 62%, Varus - 20W 7L Win Ratio 74%, Rakan - 16W 11L Win Ratio 59%, Ezreal - 10W 17L Win Ratio 37%

body:
IGN Mr Otter. Been playing the game since Season 2. Bring alot of in-game knowledge to the table. I am trying to climb efficiently and I've just recently started taking the game alot more seriously and playing to get better. If you are interested in having me on your team feel free to add me 
IGN: Mr Otter
I have a very versatile champ pool for the top lane. I specialize in tanks/bruisers. But can also play AP lanes like Rumble, Liss, Kennen.
Also I know in my op.gg it doesnt look like I play a whole lot of top lane But I was an adc main/top secondary for awhile in season 6-7 But have changed to top lane main / adc secondary. :)
